summary: Diff implements unified image+video feed items on backend and frontend, adds authenticated upload UI with caption and progress, and adds PWA manifest + service worker registration with safe-area/mobile viewport CSS. However, backend migration does not preserve existing feed items/like counts, and required app icon image assets are not shown as added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a conditional Motoko migration that preserves existing stored feed items and like counts during upgrade when state shape changes for mixed media.
missing_requirements.reason: The added migration returns an empty feedItems list and does not transform OldVideo entries into NewFeedItem entries; like counts and existing feed content would not be preserved. Also no evidence of conditional/"only when needed" logic is shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide the required PWA icon image files: zizo-app-icon.dim_512x512.png, zizo-app-icon.dim_192x192.png, zizo-app-icon-maskable.dim_512x512.png.
missing_requirements.reason: Manifest and HTML reference these icon paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual PNG files being added to the repository.
